languages.text: "В рейде на форпост, где мои агенты встречались с друкари, они захватили пленных, но потеряли почтенного брата Ульфара. Я надеялся, что они бросят все силы на его поиски, но вместо этого Волки выбили из пленников координаты этой системы и свалились мне прямо на голову. Без пространственных врат, на одних варп-двигателях они добрались сюда. Хорошо, что они слишком поздно поняли, во что угодили, и Танакии удалось их ликвидировать".

"They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."
languages.original_text: "В рейде на форпост, где мои агенты встречались с друкари, они захватили пленных, но потеряли почтенного брата Ульфара. Я надеялся, что они бросят все силы на его поиски, но вместо этого Волки выбили из пленников координаты этой системы и свалились мне прямо на голову. Без пространственных врат, на одних варп-двигателях они добрались сюда. Хорошо, что они слишком поздно поняли, во что угодили, и Танакии удалось их ликвидировать".

traits.locale_text: "During the outpost raid where my agents had met with the Drukhari, they have taken prisoners, but lost the venerable brother of Ulfar. I hoped that they would give their all to the search, but instead, the Wolves had beaten out this system's coordinates out of the prisoners and came crashing down on my head. They didn't use warps to get there – only the warp-engines. It is fortunate that they came to realize the situation they have ended up too late, so Tanakia managed to get rid of them."

"During the outpost raid where my agents had met with the Drukhari, they have taken prisoners, but lost the venerable brother of Ulfar. I hoped that they would give their all to the search, but instead, the Wolves had beaten out this system's coordinates out of the prisoners and came crashing down on my head. They didn't use warps to get there – only the warp-engines. It is fortunate that they came to realize the situation they have ended up too late, so Tanakia managed to get rid of them."

I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead, the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the prisoners and came crashing down on my head. They didn't use warps to get there—only the warp-engines. It is fortunate that they came to realise the situation they had ended up too late, so Tanakia managed to get rid of them."

I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead, the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the prisoners and came crashing down on my head. They didn't use warps to get there—only the warp-engines. It is fortunate that they came to realise the situation they had ended up too late, so Tanakia managed to get rid of them."

"They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

"They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

languages.text: « Durant l'attaque sur l'avant-poste où mes agents rencontraient les Drukharis, ils ont capturé des prisonniers, mais ont perdu le vénérable frère Ulfar. J'espérais qu'ils se consacreraient entièrement à sa recherche, mais au lieu de cela, les Loups ont soutiré les coordonnées de ce système aux captifs et me sont tombés dessus. Comme ils n'avaient pas de portail pour venir ici, ils ont simplement utilisé leurs moteurs Warp. Heureusement, ils n'ont pris conscience de leur situation que trop tard, ce qui a permis à Tanakia de les neutraliser. »
languages.original_text: "They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

traits.locale_text: « Durant l'attaque sur l'avant-poste où mes agents rencontraient les Drukharis, ils ont capturé des prisonniers, mais ont perdu le vénérable frère Ulfar. J'espérais qu'ils se consacreraient entièrement à sa recherche, mais au lieu de ça, les Loups ont soutiré les coordonnées de ce système aux captifs et me sont tombés dessus. Comme ils n'avaient pas de portail pour venir ici, ils ont simplement utilisé leurs moteurs Warp. Heureusement, ils n'ont pris conscience de leur situation que trop tard, ce qui a permis à Tanakia de les neutraliser. »

languages.text: «Saquearon un puesto avanzado en el que mis agentes se habían estado reuniendo con los Drukhari. La jauría tomó prisioneros, pero perdió a su estimado hermano Ulfar. Esperaba que dedicaran todos sus recursos a la búsqueda, pero, en lugar de eso, los Lobos arrancaron las coordenadas de este sistema a los cautivos y vino directamente a por mí. No tenían acceso a ningún portal para alcanzarme, de modo que usaron sus motores de disformidad. Por suerte, comprendieron la situación muy tarde, por lo que Tanakia logró neutralizarlos».
languages.original_text: "They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

traits.locale_text: «Durante el asalto al puesto avanzado, cuando mis agentes se encontraron con los Drukhari, tomaron prisioneros, pero perdieron al venerable hermano de Ulfar. Esperaba que se dejaran la piel en la búsqueda, pero, en lugar de ello, los Lobos sonsacaron las coordenadas de este sistema a los prisioneros y vinieron directos a por mí. Pero no usaron portales para llegar aquí, sino meros motores de disformidad. Es una suerte que se dieran cuenta de su situación cuando ya era tarde; así Tanakia pudo librarse de ellos».

languages.text: “他们袭击了我的特工与黑暗灵族会面的哨站，还俘虏了很多黑暗灵族，但却失去了尊敬的乌尔法兄弟。我本以为他们会全力搜寻乌尔法的下落，可他们却从囚犯嘴里逼问出了这个星系的坐标，之后直接朝我冲了过来。幸好，他们没有亚空间跳跃的手段，只能通过亚空间引擎飞过来。当他们终于意识到真相的时候，已经太迟了，塔娜基娅成功地消灭了他们。”
languages.original_text: "They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

traits.locale_text: “他们袭击了我的特工与黑暗灵族会面的哨站，还俘虏了很多黑暗灵族，但却失去了尊敬的乌尔法兄弟。我本希望他们会全力搜寻乌尔法的下落，可他们却从囚犯嘴里逼出了这个星系的坐标，之后直接朝我冲了过来。他们并没有通过亚空间跳跃，只用了亚空间引擎。幸好，当他们意识到究竟发生了什么事情的时候，已经太迟了，塔娜基娅成功地消灭了他们。”

languages.text: "Sie haben einen Außenposten überfallen, in dem meine Agenten sich mit den Drukhari getroffen hatten. Das Rudel hat Gefangene genommen, aber den ehrenwerten Bruder Ulfar verloren. Ich hatte gehofft, sie würden alle Kraft in die Suche investieren, doch stattdessen haben die Wolves die Koordinaten dieses Systems aus den Gefangenen herausbekommen und mich attackiert. Sie hatten kein Tor zur Verfügung, sondern haben nur ihre Warpantriebe genutzt. Zum Glück haben sie zu spät erkannt, in welcher Situation sie gelandet waren, so dass Tanakia sie neutralisieren konnte."
languages.original_text: "They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

traits.locale_text: "Bei dem Angriff auf den Außenposten, bei dem meine Agenten auf die Drukhari getroffen sind, haben sie zwar Gefangene genommen, aber den ehrenvollen Bruder Ulfars verloren. Ich hatte gehofft, sie würden alle Kraft in die Suche investieren, doch stattdessen haben die Wolves die Koordinaten dieses Systems aus den Gefangenen herausbekommen und mich attackiert. Sie haben keine Warps genutzt, um herzukommen, nur die Warpantriebe. Zum Glück haben sie zu spät erkannt, in welcher Situation sie gelandet waren, so dass Tanakia sie beseitigen konnte."

languages.text: 「私のエージェントがデュカーリと会合していた前哨基地が襲撃された。群れは捕虜を連れ去ったが、名高き同胞、ウルファーを失った。私は彼らが捜索に全力を尽くしてくれることを望んだが、その代わりにウルファーが捕虜からこの星系の座標を無理やり聞き出し、そして私の頭上に崩れ落ちてきた。 彼らには転送用の門がなく…ワープエンジンのみでたどり着いたのだ。幸運だったのは、彼らが自分たちの置かれた状況に気づくのが遅すぎたことだ。だから、タナキアは彼らを無力化することができた」
languages.original_text: "They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."

traits.locale_text: 「私のエージェントがデュカーリと会った前哨基地の襲撃で、彼らは捕虜を奪ったが、ウルファーの尊敬すべき同胞を失った。私は彼らが捜索に全力を尽くしてくれることを望んだが、その代わりにウルファーが捕虜からこの星系の座標を無理やり聞き出し、そして私の頭上に崩れ落ちてきた。彼らは<歪み>を使わず…ワープエンジンのみでたどり着いたのだ。幸運だったのは、彼らが自分たちの置かれた状況に気づくのが遅すぎたことだ。だから、タナキアは彼らを排除できた」

languages.text: "Ajanlarımın Drukharilerle buluştuğu bir karakola baskın düzenlediler. Sürü mahkûmlarını aldı ama saygıdeğer Kardeş Ulfar'ı kaybettiler. Onu aramak için her şeyi bırakıp gideceklerini sandım ama onun yerine bu sistemin koordinatlarını esirlerden alıp başıma üşüştüler. Onları taşıyacak bir geçitleri yoktu, sadece öteboyut motorları vardı. Neyse ki içinde bulundukları durumu çok geç fark ettiler, Tanakia onlardan kurtulmayı başardı."
languages.original_text: "They raided an outpost where my agents had been meeting with the Drukhari. The pack took prisoners but lost the esteemed Brother Ulfar. I hoped they would give their all to the search, but instead the Wolves forced this system's coordinates out of the captives and came crashing down on my head. They had no gate to transport them — they used nothing but their warp engines. Thankfully, they realised their situation too late, so Tanakia managed to neutralise them."
